mapper.select: SELECT GOODS_NO /* prGoodsPrcHist.getGoodsPrcHist */ , TO_CHAR(HIST_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS HIST_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(HIST_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS HIST_END_DTM , SUP_PCOST , NOR_PRC , SALE_PRC , MRGN_RATE , PRC_CHG_CAUS_CD , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_GOODS_PRC_HIST WHERE GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo} AND NOW() BETWEEN HIST_STR_DTM AND HIST_END_DTM

SELECT GOODS_NO /* prGoodsPrcHist.getGoodsPrcHistList */ , TO_CHAR(HIST_STR_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS HIST_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(HIST_END_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS HIST_END_DTM , SUP_PCOST , NOR_PRC , SALE_PRC , MRGN_RATE , PRC_CHG_CAUS_CD , FN_GET_CODENAME('PR033', PRC_CHG_CAUS_CD) AS PRC_CHG_CAUS_CD_NM , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_GOODS_PRC_HIST WHERE GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo} ORDER BY HIST_STR_DTM DESC

SELECT /* prGoodsPrcHist.checkGoodsReservedPriceHistoryYn */ CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END RESULT FROM PR_GOODS_PRC_HIST PGPH WHERE GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo} AND HIST_STR_DTM > NOW() AND HIST_END_DTM = TO_TIMESTAMP('2999-12-31 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
